story.text: A __learning garden__ is a mental picture of an idealised space for deep learning that incorporates the best ideas from the history of [[pedagogy]], into the modern world through the appropriate use of technology. It uses the metaphor of a garden as its base image.

# Rigour
It is designed to be effective in the martial arts sense, without sacrificing spiritual and intellectual rigour.

# Context
There are many [[Learning Gardens]], each can have it's own style and architecture.

story.text: [[Naturally   - Naturally Wiser]] -  nature is our classroom, as part of my Learning Journey with Nature Akademi Learning Lab.
I dedicated myself to roses and started planting roses in Molde. Moved back to Molde in 2001.

item.text: Naturally   - Naturally Wise -  nature is our classroom!
Naturally   - Naturally Wiser -  nature is our classroom!
I dedicated myself to roses and started planting roses in Molde.
I dedicated myself to roses and started planting roses in Molde,  moved back to Molde in 2001.
My journey as a singleparent started, with 2 arms and two many dreams and still a deep trust in people.
I dedicated myself to roses and started planting roses in Molde. Moved back to Molde in 2001.
My journey as a singleparent started, with 2 arms and two many dreams and still a deep trust in people.
will write more about "my Learning garden."
will write more about "my Learning garden"  an my learning journey  of the last 30 years.
[[Naturally   - Naturally Wiser]] -  nature is our classroom!
My journey as a singleparent started, with 2 arms and too many dreams and still a deep trust in people.
...will write more about "my Learning garden"  an my learning journey  of the last 30 years...
I leave Molde with an insight of not trusting People!
Learning Garden of 1999  -  recycling an idea worth doing!
Here is the reflection of the Learning Garden of 1999  -  recycling an idea worth doing - at the time I moved back to Molde.
My journey as a single parent started, with 2 arms and too many dreams and still a deep trust in people.
To get more info about me, please look at the IMS Dojo
To get more info about me, please look at the [[IMS Dojo]]

A __learning garden__ is a mental picture of an idealised space for deep learning that incorporates the best ideas from the history of pedagogy, into the modern world through the appropriate use of technology. It is designed to be effective in the martial arts sense, without sacrificing spiritual and intellectual rigour.

A __learning garden__ is a mental picture of an idealised space for deep learning that incorporates the best ideas from the history of [[pedagogy]], into the modern world through the appropriate use of technology. It is designed to be effective in the martial arts sense, without sacrificing spiritual and intellectual rigour.
[[Naturally   - Naturally Wiser]] -  nature is our classroom, as part of my Learning Journey with Nature Akademi Learning Lab.

A __learning garden__ is a mental picture of an idealised space for deep learning that incorporates the best ideas from the history of [[pedagogy]], into the modern world through the appropriate use of technology.

# Rigour

# Context
There are many [[Learning Gardens]], each can have it's own style and architecture.
